title: Mobile devs: License an engine or create your own?
text:
Mobile devs: License an engine or create your own? 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
Mobile studio Sproing's head of programming considers the issue: Go with in-house tech, or license Unity or Unreal Engine for mobile game de...
